title: Analysis of Gender-Based Differences in Entrepreneurial Learning Experiences: A Case Study-Based PBL Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational entrepreneurship theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative project-based learning conducted in environments with smartphone-centric information access.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze case studies of entrepreneurs by gender to explain differences in single/double-loop learning processes.
Learners can design and propose PBL solutions that reflect differences in entrepreneurial learning strategies based on gender.
Learners can develop a customized support program (draft) for female entrepreneurs based on research findings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
